short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Neon Bricks new generation, Offline version on your Google Chrome! Popup and Free without internet!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Neon Bricks, the addictive brick-breaking game, is now available as a Chrome Extension. Immerse yourself in a vibrant neon world right from your Chrome browser. Use your paddle to bounce the ball and break the colorful bricks.

With the Neon Bricks Chrome Extension, you can experience the fast-paced gameplay and captivating visuals directly in your browser. Aim for high scores, collect power-ups, and navigate through increasingly challenging levels.

Whether you're a fan of classic arcade games or seeking a fun and addictive experience, the Chrome Extension version of Neon Bricks offers a convenient and accessible way to enjoy this engaging game. Get ready to test your reflexes and demolish bricks in this captivating game available at your fingertips.
